title: How to Find Telegram Channels on iPhone or iPad

steps.title: Open Telegram.
steps.content: Open Telegram. It's the light-blue app with a white paper airplane in the middle, usually located on your home screen. Log in with your phone number if you aren't logged in automatically.

steps.title: Tap the search bar at the top.
steps.content: Tap the search bar at the top.

steps.title: Type tchannelsbot into search.
steps.content: Type tchannelsbot into search. Search results will filter as you type.

steps.title: Tap the "Telegram Channels Bot" result.
steps.content: Tap the "Telegram Channels Bot" result. If you typed the search term correctly, it will be the only result at the top. It's the channel with the username "@tchannelsbot" under the title.

steps.title: Tap Start.
steps.content: Tap Start . It's at the bottom of the screen. If you don't see this option, you can type /start into the message bar at the bottom, then press the blue "send" arrow above the keyboard.

steps.title: Tap an option.
steps.content: Tap an option. You can tap any of the buttons that appear, such as: Top Chart : displays the most popular channels. Recent : displays a list of recently created channels. By Category : displays all the channel categories. Search : lets you search for channels.

steps.title: Open a Channel.
steps.content: Open a Channel. Find a channel you want to join, then tap the link listed for the channel.

steps.title: Tap ＋ Join.
steps.content: Tap ＋ Join . It's at the bottom of the channel. You are now a member of the channel.

steps.title: Open a web browser.
steps.content: Open a web browser. Open Safari, Google Chrome, or any mobile web browser you prefer on your iPhone.

steps.title: Go to a telegram channel directory site.
steps.content: Go to a telegram channel directory site. You can search "Telegram channel list" or something similar on Google, or visit the following Telegram channel lists. https://tlgrm.eu/channels

steps.title: Search for a topic that interests you.
steps.content: Search for a topic that interests you. Many Telegram channel directory sites have categories such as gaming, movies, television, etc. Most websites that list Telegram channels have a search bar as well.

steps.title: Open the channel.
steps.content: Open the channel. Choose a channel and then: Tap Add to . Tap + ( https://tlgrm.eu/channels ).

steps.title: Tap + Join.
steps.content: Tap + Join . It's at the bottom of the Telegram channel. You are now a member of that channel.

steps.title: Open a web browser.
steps.content: Open a web browser. Open a web browser that is most comfortable for you.

steps.title: Go to a website that allows you to browse through open channels, groups and bots in Telegram.
steps.content: Go to a website that allows you to browse through open channels, groups and bots in Telegram. You can use this link: ' https://tdirectory.me

steps.title: Type keywords for your desired channel.
steps.content: Type keywords for your desired channel. It works just like any other search engine. For example, if you want to find food-related channels and groups, use search bar and type "food", or "recipes for dinner", or "best breakfast", etc.

steps.title: Open the channel.
steps.content: Open the channel. Choose a channel you like and tap on its name. Now tap on the "Subscribe" button. It will automatically open in Telegram app on your phone.

steps.title: Tap + Join.
steps.content: Tap + Join . You can find this button at the bottom of your screen. Now you are subscribed to this channel.
